fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run "titanium project publisher tester"

Actual:
tiapp.xml saving is currently not supported

Expected:
Should save the tiapp.xml
fields.summary: CLI: cannot save key value pairs with titanium project

comments.body:
I am able to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170620103414
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.1
Ti CLI 5.0.13
Alloy 1.9.11
Arrow 2.0.0
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
